column5: After years of going towards Kenora and Dryden we are looking ata new location.I would like any comments you may have about the Ogoki Reservoir and or Mattice Lake Outfitters. Email would be fine or post them here! Email [email protected]Thanks a bunch!!

To start with, Don and Annette are extremely gracious hosts and fine people to deal with.Secondly, their operation is truly first class....equiptment and outpost cabins are superb, and the fishing is all you could ask it to be.All in all...nothing but positives. good luck and tight lines
